site_name: Land At Southmere Village, Binsey Walk, Tavy Bridge, Southmere Drive And Mere Road Adjacent To Harrow Manorway And Yarnton Way London
description: Application for a non-material amendment to blocks C2, D1 and D2 of Phase 1A being alterations to windows and doors, terrace to a window, to provide glazed screening to roof terrace, roof level increased and parapet alterations, also a change of materials to brickwork in place of cladding on the town houses to the parent permission 16/01251/FULM.The parent permission being for a the demolition of existing buildings/hard standing, residential development of 525 units and 3691 sqm (GIA) of commercial floorspace with flexible uses across classes A1-A3 (retail, financial/professional services, cafe/restaurants), B1a (office), D1 (Non-residential institutions) and D2 (Assembly and leisure) and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping;car & cycle parking;waste storage.
